abstract:
longitudinal studies with at least three measurement waves measuring PTSD [post-traumatic stress disorder]
measured PTSD on a continuous scale via an interview or questionnaire
used a clustering method (LGMM [latent growth mixture modeling], LCGA [latent class growth analyses], hierarchical cluster analysis)
traumatic stress symptoms following events that appeared to fulfill DSM-IV [Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders] criterion A1 for PTSD or acute stress disorder.
